'''Radiant Spincrystal 14''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Windborne Hymn]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located at the back of [[Favonius Cathedral]].
